title: How regularly do you use and monitor your smart watch or are you like the majority who have it since every one has it and hardly ever use? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m of the type who can afford any smartwatch but don’t have any. Because just like phone I don’t want to be a caregiver to another device. Look after it, protect it, charge it every day, check of its efficiency, compare with latest and greatest releases etc. No ways. If I ever get a smartwatch it will be just to try it. So I’ll get a used one and I’ll never use it regularly. As I told I don’t want a job that doesn’t pay. Job = caretaker of smart watch. I’ll use it if I have to go out once a week or month to show off. And strictly make sure not to use it everyday unless I’m free and have a lot of time to waste.
